author.name: Bryan Berry - Nathen Harvey - Matt Ray

entry.title: Community Summit - Day One
entry.content:
Show Date: Tuesday October 23

  • Panel
  • Outline
  • Google+ Hangout
  • Twitter hashtag
  • Session Summaries
  • Download

Panel

  • Jamie Winsor, github, twitter
  • Eric G. Wolfe github, twitter
  • Seth Vargo github, twitter
  • Nathen Harvey github, twitter, irc: nathenharvey, blog

Outline

Nathen sits down with Eric Wolfe (@atomic_penguin), Seth Vargo (@sethvargo), and Jamie Winsor (@resetexistence) to talk about day one of the Chef Community Summit.

Topics include:

  • Open space format of the summit
  • Various sessions of the day including:
    • New Chef Documentation - check out docs.opscode.com
    • Workflow
    • Continuous Deployment and Continuous Integration
    • Testing your Infrastructure
    • Chef on Windows

Google+ Hangout

If you're not at Chef Summit, join us on Wednesday for a Google+ Hangout Chef session. Follow @foodfightshow or Nathen to be notified when we get started. We're planning on starting the hangout at 13:00 UTC.

Twitter Hashtag

Most people are using #chefsummit as the hashtag for updates from the summit. Update your filters, twitter clients, etc.

Session Summaries

Follow all the updates from the summit on the Opscode Wiki
